english_example_sentence: You, dear students, must definitely understand this difficult topic.
russian_example_sentence: Вы, дорогие студенты, обязательно должны понять эту сложную тему.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz değerli öğrenciler, bu zorlu konuyu mutlaka anlamalısınız.
